title: Pixel 4 XL Notification bar randomly opens and can't be accessed from inside 3rd party apps
content:
The problem started by not being able to swipe down to view notifications within apps.  If I go to the home screen, I am able to swipe the bar down.  However often, sometimes 20 times a minute thereafter the notification bar will open randomly while I am using apps.  This happens even if there aren't any notifications.

I have done the following
- Factory Reset
- Boot in safe mode
- Deleted most of my apps
- turned off motion, sense, gestures and all notifications

The top 10% of my screen seems to have significant lag to the touch or spots aren't responsive in certain apps and games.

Yet it still is happening.   Any ideas?
